Imogen as Izzie or Isabella needs her life to be magical similar to how Audrey Hepburn classic movies have magic She does not degrade herself calls herself a muse someone who inspi res. At the end of the day it is all about perception how you see it would be how you live it A truly beautiful woman is a happy woman .". And to be able to make everything laughable could be key.
